## policyIsExportVariables variable

Type guard to check if a [Policy](./core.policy.md) is a set of [ExportVariables](./core.exportvariables.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
policyIsExportVariables: (policy: Policy) => policy is ExportVariables
```
